allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: FlexLite PLM with Type Manager and Attribute Scoping

Implement comprehensive PLM system with the following features:

Core Features:
- Master-detail architecture for version-controlled entities (Products, Materials, Suppliers)
- Type Manager with hierarchical type trees and right-click context menu
- Attribute Manager with scoped attributes and inheritance
- Proper attribute scope filtering (attributes only visible to defined node and descendants)
- Version control system with A-Z versions and 1-999 iterations
- Dynamic attribute system with JSONB storage

Database:
- PostgreSQL with Supabase
- 10 migration files establishing schema
- Master tables (product_master, material_master, supplier_master)
- Version control tables with is_latest flag
- Type hierarchy support with entity_type_nodes
- Attribute definitions with type scoping

Technical Stack:
- Next.js 16.0.1 with App Router
- React Server Components
- Supabase for database and auth
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- JavaScript (no TypeScript)

Key Implementations:
- Attribute filtering service respecting type hierarchy
- Server actions for all CRUD operations
- Type tree view with expand/collapse
- Context menu for type management
- Scoped attribute creation with type picker

Documentation:
- ATTRIBUTE_SCOPE_FIX.md
- TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_MANAGER_IMPLEMENTATION.md
- MASTER_TABLE_REFACTORING.md
- VERSION_CONTROL_REFACTORING.md

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
